bot.about: Stardew Helper is an open-source Stardew Valley companion bot. Not affiliated with or endorsed by ConcernedApe.
tooling.list: Here are some helpful Stardew Valley tools:
funfact.title: Fun fact
funfact.entries: You can plant trees outside your farm to beautify Pelican Town.
Junimos will not harvest crops on rainy days unless you have them collect manually.
You can put a chest next to a shipping bin to quickly dump items for sale.
The Traveling Cart appears in Cindersap Forest on Fridays and Sundays.
quiz.placeholder: Quiz is coming soon. Stay tuned!
error.empty_term: Please provide a name or term to look up.
